Body:
What We've Learned Updated: The customer experiences the Bug with the Allowlists not working from 5940. We tried applying the workaround:
1. Edit the Cap Policy
2. Re-select the DPI Allowlist items
3. Save

But after Saving if we re-check the policy they are not present.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting on customer to confirm if it works now.
Waiting on customer -> will chase on next review.
